context:
Set up a basic test suite using modern tooling (Vitest recommended). Focus on:
- Core business logic (TaskService CRUD, parent/child relationships)
- Storage layer (read/write, error handling)
- CLI argument parsing

Best practices:
- Use real file system with temp directories, avoid mocking storage
- Test behavior not implementation
- Focus on edge cases and error paths
- Keep tests fast and isolated
result: Added Vitest with 59 tests covering TaskService and Storage
